title: How to Respond to Reviews with ChatGPT
description: Write professional, personalized responses to Google reviews in seconds — without sounding like a robot.
requirements: Your Google reviews (you'll copy and paste them)

steps.title: Go to ChatGPT
steps.description: Open your web browser and go to chat.openai.com
substeps: Click 'Sign up' if you don't have an account
Use your email or Google account to sign up

steps.title: Copy a review from Google
steps.description: Go to your Google Business Profile and find a review you want to respond to.
substeps: Find a review and copy the text
steps.tip: Start with your most recent reviews — responding quickly looks good to future customers.

steps.title: Ask ChatGPT to write a response
steps.description: Paste this into ChatGPT (replace the review text with the actual review):
substeps: Write a friendly, professional response to this review for my [YOUR TRADE] business. Keep it short (2-3 sentences). Sound human, not corporate.
steps.tip: Tell ChatGPT your business name and it'll include it in the response.

steps.title: Review and tweak
steps.description: Read what ChatGPT wrote. Make any small changes to sound more like you.
substeps: Check that the facts are right
Add a personal touch if you remember the job
Make sure it sounds like something you'd actually say

steps.title: Post the response
steps.description: Copy the response and paste it into Google.
substeps: Go back to your Google Business reviews

successMessage: You just responded to a review in under 2 minutes! Do this for all your reviews to show customers you care about feedback.
proTips: Respond to negative reviews too — a professional response shows future customers how you handle problems
Save your favorite ChatGPT prompts in a notes app so you can reuse them
Try to respond within 24-48 hours of getting a review
